text: The Main road 43 () is an east–west First class main road in Hungary, that connects Szeged (the Main road 5 change) with Nagylak (the border of Romania). The road is long.Magyarország, autóatlasz 1:200.000, Honvédelmi Minisztérium Térképészeti Kht., . Most of the traffic was taken over by the M43 motorway. The road, as well as all other main roads in Hungary, is managed and maintained by Magyar Közút, state owned company. ==See also== * Roads in Hungary ==Sources== ==External links== * Hungarian Public Road Non-Profit Ltd. (Magyar Közút Nonprofit Zrt.) * National Infrastructure Developer Ltd. Category:Main roads in Hungary Category:Csongrád County
title: Main road 43 (Hungary)
